subject: Prepare Market Research Report
body: Dear Jayesh, I hope you're doing well. I would like to assign you the task of preparing a comprehensive market research report on the latest trends in AI-driven solutions for startups. This will help guide our upcoming strategy sessions and provide valuable insights for potential business opportunities. Here are the key details for the report: - *Scope*: Focus on AI tools, platforms, and services that startups are adopting in 2024. - *Deadline*: Please submit your findings by Friday, February 16th. - *Format*: A PowerPoint presentation with key highlights and a one-page executive summary. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further clarification. Looking forward to your insights! Best regards, Sarah Johnson Project Manager, InnovateX Incubator sarah.johnson@innovatex.com
task_name: Market Research Report on AI-driven Solutions for Startups
task_description: Prepare a comprehensive market research report on the latest trends in AI-driven solutions for startups. Focus on AI tools, platforms, and services that startups are adopting in 2024.  The report should be a PowerPoint presentation with key highlights and a one-page executive summary.
